about_the_game:
Many years have past since the historic War of the Roses, and the governing body of Elsinore has decided that it is time to lead the world back from the brink of destruction. What better way than to take a bunch of young adults and throw them in a high-stress environment to see which one can take the throne?

The ancient battle college once known as Dragongate has now been reopened as Elsinore Academy, an educational training ground for future royalty! Oh, and future royalty-adjacent. We can't forget about them. I'm sure they get nice rooms, too. Right? Go to classes, learn new and exciting lore about the world which you then can utilize to sound cooler around your crush(es), and enlist in the local sportsball team!

  • Genre: Visual Novel, Dating Sim
  • A Cast of Millions: Ten love interests and MANY different co-eds!
  • The College Experience!: Well, if the college was full of tests designed to push you to the physical and mental limits in an attempt to find the net ruler of a nation.
  • Broken up into three phases: Each year consists of three quarters each. You'll have a class segment, a social segment, and a sportsball segment.

highlighted.name: Study of Cat Girls/Boys: Freshman Year DONE!
Study of Cat Girls/Boys: Sophomore Year DONE!
Study of Cat Girls/Boys: Junior Year DONE!

content_descriptors.notes: Sexual innuendo. Mention of drug use. Heavy discussions about death and child abandonment.

detailed_description:
Many years have past since the historic War of the Roses, and the governing body of Elsinore has decided that it is time to lead the world back from the brink of destruction. What better way than to take a bunch of young adults and throw them in a high-stress environment to see which one can take the throne?

The ancient battle college once known as Dragongate has now been reopened as Elsinore Academy, an educational training ground for future royalty! Oh, and future royalty-adjacent. We can't forget about them. I'm sure they get nice rooms, too. Right? Go to classes, learn new and exciting lore about the world which you then can utilize to sound cooler around your crush(es), and enlist in the local sportsball team!

  • A Cast of Millions: Ten love interests and MANY different co-eds!
  • The College Experience!: Well, if the college was full of tests designed to push you to the physical and mental limits in an attempt to find the net ruler of a nation.
  • Broken up into three phases: Each year consists of three quarters each. You'll have a class segment, a social segment, and a sportsball segment.

short_description: Train to become royalty, or royalty-adjacent, while also just trying to get out of this crazy, weird academy alive. Will you date any cat girls or cat boys along the way? Highly probable.
